title: Android-powered Nothing phone (1) to launch summer 2022 w/ Snapdragon processor
content:
Despite having only launched a single product, during Nothing Technologies’ “The Truth” live stream CEO Carl Pei confirmed plans to launch an Android-powered phone called “phone (1)” in Summer 2022.

more…

The post Android-powered Nothing phone (1) to launch summer 2022 w/ Snapdragon processor appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Carl Pei's Nothing Technologies will launch its phone (1) in summer 2022 with a Snapdragon processor and Android-based Nothing OS.
